short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for viewing hardware design files on Github

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for generating links in Github viewing PCB and 3D modeling files in-browser! No need to pull the repo to checkout hardware designs hosted in Github; just click the generated link next to the filename in a repo, and view the source immediately.
